Package XXLChess

Class PlayerAgent

java.lang.Object
XXLChess.PlayerAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Tickable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bot, Human
public abstract class PlayerAgent extends Object implements Tickable
Abstract class that represents a player in the chess game. This class implements the Tickable interface, which allows the player's timer to tick (or count down) each second.

    • decreaseRemainingTime

      public void decreaseRemainingTime() throws TimeoutException
      Decrease the remaining time by 1 second. Throws a TimeoutException if the remaining time is zero.
      Throws:
      TimeoutException

    • getRemainingTime

      public int getRemainingTime()
      Get the remaining time for the player. Returns zero if the timer has ended.

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Tick the player's timer, decreasing the remaining time by 1 second. Throws an IllegalStateException if the timer has ended.
      Specified by:
      tick in interface Tickable

    • isEnded

      public boolean isEnded()
      Check if the player's time has ended. Returns true if the timer has ended, false otherwise.
      Specified by:
      isEnded in interface Tickable
      Returns:
      true if this object's lifecycle has ended, false otherwise
